violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements
package name similar to existing packages

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: The most obvious and appropriate name for this would be `IntrinsicNeuralTimescales`. Long and descriptive names like that are strongly encourage by the community (unlike in other languages, maybe), while acronyms are heavily frowned upon. So writing out acronyms like `INT` is usually the way to go.

discussion.author: duodenum96
discussion.text: Thanks! I will fix the problems and try again.
